I'm Aniket. I love to code, listen to music and I even write free-verses at times. A majority of my work is writing syntax for design.

By Aniket Pant

Prima Facie

Posted on 18 November 2011
Under poetry
Tweet

Don’t just breathe
Feel life
The life in my veins

Well I’m not dead
Blood flows through my veins
I’m no puppet of yours
My heart beats fast
Faster than you can speak up,
For yourself!

Untie your hands
Let your thoughts wonder
Into a dreamland
Don’t let him drive you to his Doom!

Sadness is not all around me
It just find some pieces in my life
Ruins, not everything is like that
Find what you want
Take it and keep it safe
Don’t let misery fall upon it!

Hey, you just went through 90 words written by Aniket.

If you liked them, then you should definitely follow him on twitter too. He would be excited to know that you like his work.
